name: Mental Loops
description:
Mental loops!

Work your way through puzzles to escape your mind.

WASD for movement.

Credits:

Sounds

- Button press - Iwan 'qubodup' Gabovitch
- Portal wind - DontMind8.win
- Background music - Philippe Groarke

Textures:

Wallpaper texture is from Quixel Megascans, and the brick and cobble stone is from the Unreal starter content.
